title: Optimizing CI/CD pipelines for NodeJS projects
description: Reorganizing the GitHub workflows by separating concerns, reusing Docker test containers, and sharding tests for parallel execution reduces waiting time for CI pipelines. It enhances feedback cycles, leading to increased developer experience.

title: Deploying Django Apps on Heroku
description: Deploying Django apps on Heroku, Heroku is a PaaS that enables developers to build, run, and operate applications.
